name: Zimi
headline: Platform for international brands to sell, ship, and get paid globally
description:
Zimi is a cross-border commerce partner dedicated to simplifying global expansion for international brands. We empower businesses to thrive in new markets by optimizing cross-border logistics, offering seamless local fulfillment, and automating secure international payments—all in one streamlined platform. 

Cross-border e-commerce is a $2 trillion opportunity by 2030, however, cross-border merchants face major challenges like high shipping costs, lengthy delivery times, and complex logistics. This is particular true for merchants in emerging markets. With Zimi, merchants reach their international buyers in 1-2 days instead of weeks and for a fraction of the price. Our aim is to make selling internationally as easy as selling locally - starting with merchants selling into the U.S. market.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:e-commerce; industry:supply-chain; industry:retail; location:new-york

founders.name: Audrey Djiya, Co-Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Audrey Djiya is the Co-Founder & CEO of Zimi. Before Zimi, Audrey led international expansion and unlocked $M in revenue for e-commerce businesses like Peloton and launched fintech products to enable cross-border commerce at start-ups like Duplo (YC W23). 

Audrey earned her MBA from Stanford University and BA from Dartmouth College.

founders.name: Peter Nsaka, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience. Previously a Senior Software Engineer and Project Tech Lead @ Shopify. Currently working on Zimi to bring Amazon-prime like fulfillment to African exporters - making it easy, fast, and cheap for these businesses to sell internationally.

# The Simplest way to Sell Internationally
Go global with Zimi, starting in the U.S. Ship cross-border, fulfill orders locally, and receive USD payments—all on one platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/674778402cfbf0a22761fa95_global.avif)
[Book a Demo](https://www.withzimi.com/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/iV72v7cP?typeform-source=www.withzimi.com>)
![Orire](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495bcf831cb99ea2afbab1_Orire.webp)
![Arami](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495c08feaee4fe6f2c31f0_Arami.webp)
![Urban Outfitters](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495c3d91597a24833a8de6_Urban%20Outfitters.webp)
![Free People](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495c76d4e5b38d4523cc6d_Free%20People.webp)
![Shopbop](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495c9e8521c4f0ad564c30_Shopbop.webp)
![Mot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495cc2160439978d1a9fae_Mot.webp)
![Desiree Iyama](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495d00feac1ed932076bfc_Desiree%20Iyama.webp)
![Cbazaar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495d30426bff380ac86ee0_Cbazaar.webp)
![Elexiay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495d77a8ba172ada7d4a4c_elexiay.webp)
![Kadiju](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495db76fc4f7690ac0e982_Kadiju.webp)
![Nordstrom](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495deaa8ba172ada7da8eb_Nordstrom.webp)
![Sustai](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495e1469ec2f72af8b540a_Sustai.webp)
![Cassvita](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495e4c2bcd45d43343fb49_Cassvita.webp)
![Soulurns](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a70/67495e7e3ec1e57f3b850b96_Soulurns.webp)
## Expand Globally with Ease
Zimi is a cross-border commerce provider that unlocks turnkey global expansion for international brands. We make expansion easy.
Storage and Order Fulfillment
Keep products closer to customers in one of Zimi’s warehouses and let us manage D2C and B2B order fulfillment for reliable, 2-day delivery.
Returns Management
We’ll handle reverse logistics locally. Streamline returns with U.S.-based handling to enhance customer satisfaction and reduce costs.
Market & Demand Insights
Gain a competitive edge with data-driven market insights and demand forecasting to optimize inventory and meet international customer demand.
Ocean & Air Freight
Access reliable and cost-effective ocean and air freight services to move your goods cross-border with ease. 
Cross-Border Payments
Receive USD payments instantly with Zimi as your Merchant of Record, ensuring secure transactions for U.S. sales. We’ll handle tax and compliance.
![Cross-Border  Payments ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/674785bcb401fb641ed13d9d_Cross-Border%20%20Payments.avif)
## Our Results Speak for Themselves
20%
Average increase in revenue
80%
Average savings per shipment
2.5 days
Average time from checkout to doorstep
## Easy integration with top e-commerce platforms
![ebay](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748182f3ff76363292ebc0d_ebay.avif)
![Tiltok](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748187e8ee727c7afd799df_tiktok.avif)

![W](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748191ab9cd09200f6c11e2_W.avif)
![E](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/674819436b7689b97b2ef8dd_E.avif)

## How It Works
[Order Fulfillment](https://www.withzimi.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Global Payments](https://www.withzimi.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)
## Streamlined Order Fulfillment
![Connect your online store and sync your products in a few clicks.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748334629e558b867921656_STEP%201_order.avif)
STEP 1
Connect your online store and sync your products in a few clicks.
![Pick the items you want to send to us \(we’re happy to help\) and use our ocean and air providers to ship inventory to a Zimi warehouse.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/674836948d6aba3014a5eabc_STEP%202_order.avif)
STEP 2
Pick the items you want to send to us (we’re happy to help) and use our ocean and air providers to ship inventory to a Zimi warehouse.
![Store your inventory with us, go live with fast, affordable shipping on your site, and we’ll handle the rest! ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/674836acc4ab1086a2474091_STEP%203_order.avif)
STEP 3
Store your inventory with us, go live with fast, affordable shipping on your site, and we’ll handle the rest!
![As orders come in, we’ll pick, pack, and ship directly to your customers from our warehouse, with automatic delivery triggered upon receipt.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/674836d729156f0596dd6acb_STEP%204_order.avif)
STEP 4
As orders come in, we’ll pick, pack, and ship directly to your customers from our warehouse, with automatic delivery triggered upon receipt.
## Global Payments
![Complete KYB verification.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748b97c96bc3b09502ea0b5_Payments_Step_1.avif)
STEP 1
Complete KYB verification.
![Receive business bank account details  for USD payments.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748b996c473c361c6b611ca_Payments_Step_2.avif)
STEP 2
Receive business bank account details for USD payments.
![Link your account to your online store  and marketplaces.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748b9c09a161eab064fb054_Payments_Step_3.avif)
STEP 3
Link your account to your online store and marketplaces.
![When a customer makes a purchase, the payment is processed by Zimi. We verify the payment, check for fraud, and ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748b9f6aaac8304ca2b75b1_Payments_Step_4.avif)
STEP 4
When a customer makes a purchase, the payment is processed by Zimi. We verify the payment, check for fraud, and ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
![Your payout, minus any applicable fees, is transferred to your Zimi account for easy access.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748ba32c010f409f7c4cd5c_Payments_Step_5.avif)
STEP 5
Your payout, minus any applicable fees, is transferred to your Zimi account for easy access.
![Track revenue and transactions live  on the Zimi dashboard.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748ba29982757ab040ac22f_Payments_Step_6.avif)
STEP 6
Track revenue and transactions live on the Zimi dashboard.
![Make global payments with a Zimi debit card.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748ba81ef18b4007a6f2c66_Payments_Step_7.png)
STEP 7
Make global payments with a Zimi debit card.
![Withdraw funds instantly to your local bank account whenever needed.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748baa6e17311db18843380_Payments_Step_8.avif)
STEP 8
Withdraw funds instantly to your local bank account whenever needed.
## Supercharge your global business expansion now
![Global](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748be3ca4ce1d04ee1066f3_global_cta.avif)
[Book a Call](https://www.withzimi.com/<https:/form.typeform.com/to/iV72v7cP?typeform-source=www.withzimi.com>)
## Features
Get all the delivery tools and support you need in one place
[Multi-Currency Wallet](https://www.withzimi.com/<#Multi-Currency-Wallet>)[Order Management](https://www.withzimi.com/<#Order-Management>)[Inventory and Warehouse Management](https://www.withzimi.com/<#Inventory-and-Warehouse-Management>)[Customer Relationship Management](https://www.withzimi.com/<#Customer-Relationship-Management>)[Shipment Tracking](https://www.withzimi.com/<#Shipment-Tracking>)[Customs Brokerage](https://www.withzimi.com/<#Customs-Brokerage>)[Dedicated Account Manager](https://www.withzimi.com/<#Dedicated-Account-Manager>)
### Multi-Currency Wallet
![Multi-Currency Wallet](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748a32a9240c0fc6e829559_Multi-Currency%20Wallet.avif)
Hold and receive payments, starting with USD. Check your funds and cash out whenever you need.
### Order Management
![Order Management ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748a883ccedfe8b48b152b5_Order%20Management%20.avif)
Handle the order process automatically, from start to finish: picking, packing, shipping, and returns. Track all your orders in one place.
### Inventory and Warehouse Management
![Inventory and Warehouse Management ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748a8ebbee176d5b780b920_Inventory%20and%20Warehouse%20Management%20.avif)
Track inventory levels across warehouses and receive timely restock alerts.
### Customer Relationship Management
![Customer Relationship Management ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748a94af42d129303f4d0e2_Customer%20Relationship%20Management%20.avif)
Ensure effective communication with your buyers with a single source of customer information.
### Shipment Tracking
![Shipment Tracking ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6749bccf33bcc722056c8ff4_Shipment%20Tracking%20.avif)
Monitor all your shipments in one place, from cross-border to last-mile delivery. Gain real-time visibility and provide accurate delivery updates to your customers. 
### Customs Brokerage
![Customs Brokerage](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6749c2392fd232ff7f7c621f_Customs%20Brokerage.avif)
Manage customs paperwork and ensure compliance for imports and exports.
### Dedicated Account Manager
![Dedicated Account Manager](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6747685e0b288f88dec94a4a/6748abd5f27258ad9bd41f44_Dedicated%20Account%20Manager.avif)
Get personalized support based on your business needs.
## Expand Globally with Ease
Ready to take your brand's global revenue to the next level?

generated_description:
### Zimi: Simplifying Cross-Border E-Commerce

**Company Overview**
Founded in 2023 and operating out of New York, Zimi is an innovative platform dedicated to facilitating international sales for brands looking to expand globally. As a part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Zimi’s mission is to make the complexities of cross-border commerce a breeze for businesses. With a small but passionate team of just two employees, the company is already making waves in the e-commerce landscape.

**Problem and Solution**
The world of cross-border e-commerce is projected to hit a staggering $2 trillion by 2030. However, merchants often face significant hurdles such as exorbitant shipping fees, lengthy delivery durations, and convoluted logistics—issues that are especially pronounced for brands in emerging markets. 

Enter Zimi. The platform aims to radically shorten delivery times to just 1-2 days for US-bound orders, all while reducing costs dramatically. By integrating logistics, local fulfillment, and secure international payments into a single platform, Zimi empowers merchants to navigate international sales as easily as they do local transactions.

**Service Offerings**
What does Zimi provide? Here’s a quick breakdown:
- **Storage and Order Fulfillment**: Zimi manages warehousing and delivery, ensuring a reliable timeline for orders.
- **Returns Management**: Handling returns is seamless with local facilities taking the lead, enhancing customer satisfaction.
- **Market Insights**: The platform provides data-driven insights into market demand, helping brands optimize inventory.
- **Freight Services**: Access to affordable air and ocean freight options makes shipping cross-border a straightforward process.
- **Payments**: As your Merchant of Record, Zimi processes USD payments, relieving you of the headache of tax compliance and security.

**Results That Matter**
Zimi has already demonstrated tangible benefits for its users:
- **20% average increase in revenue**
- **80% average savings per shipment**
- **2.5 days average time from checkout to delivery**

**Integration Made Easy**
Zimi simplifies onboarding by seamlessly integrating with major e-commerce platforms like Amazon, eBay, Shopify, and more, paving the way for brands to launch and manage their international operations effortlessly.

**The Zimi Advantage**
The core around which Zimi revolves is its unique ability to merge all elements of international selling—from fulfillment to payments—all in one place. With features like a multi-currency wallet, order management, and a dedicated account manager, Zimi positions itself as not just a service provider but a partner in global expansion.

So, if selling globally feels daunting, Zimi is here to change the game. With a commitment to supporting brands every step of the way, Zimi invites you to experience how easy international e-commerce can be. 

Find out more by visiting [Zimi’s website](https://www.withzimi.com).
